msg.en: ЁЯУЕ Before 5 May 1962, Maharashtra had Janapad Sabhas. To strengthen local self-governance, involve locals in planning, and decentralize power, the Zilla Parishad and Panchayat Samiti Act, 1961 was passed. From 5 May 1962, Zilla Parishads were established at the district level and Panchayat Samitis at the block level...
